verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: As US president] , [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: has] [ARG1: a responsibility to deal with North Korea 's nuclear threat toward his people before he champions the rights of North Koreans] . On Tuesday , however , Trump did more than compartmentalize : He apologized .
